text: Eagle is a 1991 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Ambili, starring P Sukumar and Poonam Dasgupta. http://spicyonion.com/title/eagle-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * P.Sukumar (Kiran) as Vinod * Poonam Dasgupta as Latha * Innocent as Appukuttan/Prof Murugadas * James as Gunda * Kasthuri as Anu * Kuthiravattam Pappu as Azeez * Sandhya as Doctor *Anandavally *Biju Menon as Hotel Receptionist (uncredited) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Eagle (1991 film)
